description: YY-CHR is a pixel editor that can display and edit images contained in ROMs of retro games such as Famicom and Super Famicom. It also comes with tools [ROM Palette Editor] and [PRG Pattern Editor] for editing palettes and BG patterns
notes: you can check out the templates for nes and snes at the installed location.
